targets.query: SELECT "group_total_paths" FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$instance$/ AND "peer_group_name"::tag =~ /^$peergroup$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance_name"::tag, "peer_group_name"::tag fill(previous)

select sum(mean) from(SELECT mean("group_safi_received") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$instance$/ AND "peer_group_name"::tag =~ /^$peergroup$/)  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance_name"::tag, "peer_group_name"::tag, "peer_group_afi_safi_name"::tag) GROUP BY "instance_name"::tag, "peer_group_name"::tag, time(61s) fill(previous)

select sum(mean) from(SELECT mean("group_safi_installed") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$instance$/ AND "peer_group_name"::tag =~ /^$peergroup$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance_name"::tag, "peer_group_name"::tag, "peer_group_afi_safi_name"::tag) GROUP BY "instance_name"::tag, "peer_group_name"::tag, time(61s) fill(previous)

select sum(mean) from(SELECT  mean("group_safi_sent") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$instance$/ AND "peer_group_name"::tag =~ /^$peergroup$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance_name"::tag, "peer_group_name"::tag, "peer_group_afi_safi_name"::tag) GROUP BY "instance_name"::tag, "peer_group_name"::tag, time(61s) fill(previous)

select sum(mean) from (SELECT mean("group_safi_total_paths") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$instance$/ AND "peer_group_afi_safi_name"::tag =~ /^$family$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance_name"::tag, "peer_group_name"::tag, "peer_group_afi_safi_name"::tag, time(61s)) GROUP BY "peer_group_afi_safi_name"::tag, time(61s) fill(previous)

SELECT "session_state" FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "instance_name"::tag =~ /^$instance$/ AND "neighbor_address"::tag =~ /^$neighbor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "neighbor_address"::tag
SELECT mean("session_output_queue") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "neighbor_address"::tag =~ /^$neighbor$/)   GROUP BY time(31s) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("session_output_queue") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "neighbor_address"::tag =~ /^$neighbor$/)   GROUP BY time(31s) fill(previous)

SELECT mean("safi_received") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "neighbor_address"::tag =~ /^$neighbor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "neighbor_address"::tag, "neighbor_afi_safi_name"::tag, time(61s) fill(previous)

SELECT mean("safi_received_pre_policy")-mean("safi_accepted") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "neighbor_address"::tag =~ /^$neighbor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "neighbor_address"::tag, "neighbor_afi_safi_name"::tag, time(61s) fill(previous)

SELECT mean("safi_installed") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "neighbor_address"::tag =~ /^$neighbor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "neighbor_address"::tag, "neighbor_afi_safi_name"::tag, time(61s) fill(previous)

SELECT mean("safi_sent") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "neighbor_address"::tag =~ /^$neighbor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "neighbor_address"::tag, "neighbor_afi_safi_name"::tag, time(61s) fill(previous)

SELECT ("safi_received_pre_policy" -  "safi_accepted") FROM "NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP" WHERE ("SHORTNAME"::tag =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "neighbor_address"::tag =~ /^$neighbor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "neighbor_afi_safi_name"::tag

list.definition: show tag values from NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP with key="SHORTNAME"
list.label: Router
list.name: rtr
list.query: show tag values from NETWORK_INSTANCE_BGP with key="SHORTNAME"

list.definition: show tag values with key="instance_name" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance
list.query: show tag values with key="instance_name" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/

list.definition: show tag values with key="peer_group_name" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/ and instance_name=~/$instance/
list.label: Peer Group
list.name: peergroup
list.query: show tag values with key="peer_group_name" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/ and instance_name=~/$instance/

list.definition: show tag values with key="peer_group_afi_safi_name" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/ and peer_group_name=~/$peergroup/
list.label: Family
list.name: family
list.query: show tag values with key="peer_group_afi_safi_name" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/ and peer_group_name=~/$peergroup/

list.definition: show tag values with key="neighbor_address" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/ and instance_name=~/$instance/ and neighbor_afi_safi_name=~/$family/
list.label: Neighbor
list.name: neighbor
list.query: show tag values with key="neighbor_address" where SHORTNAME=~/$rtr/ and instance_name=~/$instance/ and neighbor_afi_safi_name=~/$family/
